bibl.title: The Hellenistic World and its Economic Development.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: AHR 41 (1936) pp. 233-252. - Presidential Address delivered before the American Historical Association at Chattanooga on December 28, 1935. This address is a summary of the corresponding chapter in "The Social and Economic History of the Hellenistic World" (in preparation).

bibl.title: Michael I. ROSTOVTZEFF, Scripta varia. Ellenismo e impero romano. A cura di Arnaldo MARCONE = Studi storici sulla Tarda Antichità. 3

bibl.seg: ROSTOVTZEFF Michael I., The Hellenistic World and its Economic Development.
Michael I. ROSTOVTZEFF, Scripta varia. Ellenismo e impero romano. A cura di Arnaldo MARCONE = Studi storici sulla Tarda Antichità. 3 (Bari, 1995) pp. 351-369.

Reproduit de: AHR 41 (1936) pp. 233-252. - Presidential Address delivered before the American Historical Association at Chattanooga on December 28, 1935. This address is a summary of the corresponding chapter in "The Social and Economic History of the Hellenistic World" (in preparation).
